actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960 (46 U.S.C. section 216) to limit the liability of Great Lakes pilots, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Limits the liability in damages to $1,000 for the negligence of any licensed Great Lakes pilot under the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960. (Amends 46 U.S.C. 216)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960 (46 U.S.C. section 216) to limit the liability of Great Lakes pilots, and for other purposes.
